title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 January 2016 - XWiki
content:
<iphar> guys I still don't get it how to change the default xwiki web port on windows, in C:\$XWIKI\_HOME\jetty\etc\jetty.xml I see "<Property name="jetty.port" default="8080" />" changed it to "default=80" and reboot xwiki, but it's back to port :8080 :(  
02:51 <iphar> any ideas?  
03:43 <iphar> is now known as <iphar``>  
03:44 <iphar``> is now known as <iphar`>
